Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class has attributes and behaviours which all users should be able to.
    Author:
    Muhammet Selcuk Guvel

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String dateofBirth,
            java.lang.String graduatedSchool)
        User class constructor which initializes the properties of user object. It also increments the stuserID when the object is created.
        Parameters:
        name - the user's name
        userName - the user's username
        password - the user's password
        dateofBirth - the user's date of birth
        graduatedSchool - the school where the user is graduated from

      • addtextpost

        public void addtextpost(java.lang.String textContent,
                        double longitude,
                        double latitude,
                        java.lang.String userNames)
        Adds text post to the postslist collection Checks whether the userNames contain any foreigner
        Parameters:
        textContent - the text post's text content
        longitude - the longitude of posting place
        latitude - the latitude of posting place
        userNames - the usernames which intended to be tagged

      • addimagepost

        public void addimagepost(java.lang.String textContent,
                         double longitude,
                         double latitude,
                         java.lang.String userNames,
                         java.lang.String filePath,
                         java.lang.String resolution)
        Adds image post to the postslist collection Checks whether the userNames contain any foreigner
        Parameters:
        textContent - the image post's text content
        longitude - the longitude of posting place
        latitude - the latitude of posting place
        userNames - the usernames which intended to be tagged
        filePath - the image's file path
        resolution - the image's resolution

      • addvideopost

        public void addvideopost(java.lang.String textContent,
                         double longitude,
                         double latitude,
                         java.lang.String userNames,
                         java.lang.String filePath,
                         int videoDuration)
        Adds video post to the postslist collection Checks whether the userNames contain any foreigner Checks whether the length of the video is less than 10 minutes
        Parameters:
        textContent - the image post's text content
        longitude - the longitude of posting place
        latitude - the latitude of posting place
        userNames - the usernames which intended to be tagged
        filePath - the video's file path
        videoDuration - the length of the video

        Parameters:
